channel.title: New PC, What do you think?
channel.description:
Well, recently runescape update P (pest control), it is now divided into 3 lvls of boats, on for 20-69, one for 70-99, then one for 100+, The updates are good if you have a good world, you will receive 3 points per game. Now today, in world 99 A riot went on with 30+ noobs rioting because the lvl 80+'s are all gone, and they cant win.
Discuss what you think about the updates here.
Mine: I like them, except the barriers that the portals have now.

item.title: New PC, What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

100+ is a little harder, but not that hard. The lvl 90 ravagers hit 14’s so…

Can easily be avoided, plenty of prayers in stock. But I have noticed from experience, the monsters ignore armor bonuses, so its quite annoying.

Read full topic
item.source: New PC, What do you think?

item.title: New PC, What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

I thinkt he update is great, Not havving all the noobs in the way is realy great.
I even went to the low lvl boat on my lvl 41 and I have no problem hitting the portals. I think its just the sore losers that who dont wanna help out, that dont like it.
I dont normaly go on the 100+ boat, I enjoy the middle one, its so easy.

Great update

Read full topic

item.title: New PC, What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @Tribal Tribal
item.description:
@Tribal wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:13, topic:124507”][quote author=pko link=topic=174413.msg1617818#msg1617818 date=1185016121]
Nope, I dislike it. They should put it back the way it was, only thing not to change would be the exchange X.
[/quote]
Your probly lvl 69 -, And wish you could still steal points from 80+'s in pc.[/quote]
I’m lvl 98 and i think it sucks ass.
Whats wrong with the jagex idiots?Instead of trying to work on the whole marcoing problem they make some retarded updates like the one for PC.
I think they hired a bunch of monkeys lately to write the new updates

Read full topic

item.title: New PC, What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

the new pc is awesome for 100+

my thought is that they should lower the amount of time you have to wait to kill all the portals. you have to wait like 2 minutes to attack then a minute to finish it off… thats bs now games take like 3 minutes instead of 1 min… which really sets back hwo fast you can get exp.

item.description:
@w00tz0r_pwnz wrote:

I think its could they changed it. The low lvls would never knew what was going on and they wouldn’t help. The majority of the time now the 70-99’s are pretty knowledgeable(possible 100+ at times).So ya i think its good so now all the low lvls can be off messing up by themselfs and not get people angry.
